\documentclass[preview]{standalone}
\usepackage{amsthm, amsfonts, amsmath, amssymb, mathrsfs, tikz-cd, tikz, ctex, mathtools}
\usepackage{quiver}
\begin{document}

% https://q.uiver.app/#
\begin{tikzcd}[ampersand replacement=\&]
	\&\& C \&\& N \\
	{X^F} \&\& {X^C} \&\& X
	\arrow["a", from=1-3, to=1-5]
	\arrow["f"', from=1-3, to=2-3]
	\arrow[""{name=0, anchor=center, inner sep=0}, "s"', from=1-5, to=2-3]
	\arrow["b", from=1-5, to=2-5]
	\arrow["i"', from=2-1, to=2-3]
	\arrow["p"', from=2-3, to=2-5]
	\arrow["\circlearrowright"{description}, draw=none, from=0, to=2-5]
\end{tikzcd}
\end{document}
